# Apostolado SPA - React + Vite + Tailwind

## Project Overview
A Single-Page Application for a religious formation apostolate with dynamic role-based access control (RBAC).

## Technology Stack
- React 18
- Vite (build tool)
- Tailwind CSS (styling)
- React Router (navigation)
- Vanilla JavaScript for state management

## Design Theme
- Dark mode aesthetic (bg-black, bg-gray-950)
- Gold/amber accent color (text-amber-500, bg-amber-500)
- Font: Inter (sans-serif)
- Fully responsive, mobile-first design
